posts.post_title: T206's HOFers/Foster SL, Piedmont Fac. 42 and Lajoie T216 for sale/trade
posts.post_content:
I have the following T206's and T216 for sale or trade. If trade looking for Chief Meyers
Portrait with an EPDG or Cycle 460 back or HOF with Carolina Brights or 
Cycle 350 back. I will consider any trade offer. If purchasing, prices include 
shipping. If paypal either gift or add 3%. Any questions let me know.
[URL="mhgt@embarqmail.com"]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/URL]

Scans of cards can be viewed here.[url]http://imageevent.com/mhgt/forsaletrade?n=0[/url]
